name: Scarfy The Penguin
description:
Scarfy The Penguin v1.04 - Release Notes
02/23/20

Help Scarfy get back to the colony in this fun filled retro 'mario-avania' adventure!

Created for the OpenGameArt.org Winter Game Jam 2020

This game was inspired by the game idea 'An animal simulation game' submitted by WorldLover.
I'm not sure if this game could be called a 'simulation' of any kind, but it was WorldLover's idea that got me thinking and started the creative juices flowing, so many thanks to WorldLover for sharing such a cool idea!

System Requirements:
Windows PC
Microsoft .NET Framework vers 4.0 (or better)
OpenGL 3.0 Compatible Video Card
   Nvidia GeForce 8000 series or better
   Ati Radeon HD 2000 series or better
   Intel HD 4500 or better
   You can check specific cards at:
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Nvidia_graphics_processing_units
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_AMD_graphics_processing_units
   http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Comparison_of_Intel_graphics_processing_units
100mb Free Hard Drive Space

Controls -
Keyboard -
Move around     - arrow keys, num key pad, or wasd
Jump - Space bar, ctrl or alt

Joystick -
Move around     - Left stick (x/y Axis), Dpad or POV Hat
Jump - button 1, 2, 3, 4, A, B, X, or Y

Pause:
Escape, P, Back button, Button 7 or Button 10

Quit:
At title screen press Escape, P, Back button, Button 7 or Button 10

To change screen mode/res:
Goto to Options -> Video

Known Bugs:
Continue Feature does not work.

Change Log:
